title: Microsoft shares script to restore inetpub folder you shouldn’t delete
summary: Microsoft has released a PowerShell script to help restore an empty 'inetpub' folder created by the April 2025 Windows security updates if deleted. As Microsoft previously warned, this folder helps mitigate a high-severity Windows Process Activation privilege escalation vulnerability. [...]

title: Tax resolution firm Optima Tax Relief hit by ransomware, data leaked
summary: U.S. tax resolution firm Optima Tax Relief suffered a Chaos ransomware attack, with the threat actors now leaking data stolen from the company. [...]

title: New Atomic macOS Stealer Campaign Exploits ClickFix to Target Apple Users
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers are alerting to a new malware campaign that employs the ClickFix social engineering tactic to trick users into downloading an information stealer malware known as Atomic macOS Stealer (AMOS) on Apple macOS systems.

title: Kettering Health confirms Interlock ransomware behind cyberattack
summary: Healthcare giant Kettering Health, which manages 14 medical centers in Ohio, confirmed that the Interlock ransomware group breached its network and stole data in a May cyberattack. [...]

title: New PathWiper data wiper malware hits critical infrastructure in Ukraine
summary: A new data wiper malware named 'PathWiper' is being used in targeted attacks against critical infrastructure in Ukraine, aimed at disrupting operations in the country. [...]

title: Critical Fortinet flaws now exploited in Qilin ransomware attacks
summary: The Qilin ransomware operation has recently joined attacks exploiting two Fortinet vulnerabilities that allow bypassing authentication on vulnerable devices and executing malicious code remotely. [...]
